document_data.name: Karadandel
document_data.nicknames: the Sly{{Cite organized play/LFR/Stirring the Embers|17}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Karadandel''' was a fence and information broker who operated out of [[Tarmalune]] as of [[1479 DR]].{{Cite organized play/LFR/Pyrophobia|15}}
document_data.Description: Karadandel was a [[tiefling]] woman with long honey-blonde hair and mischievous blue eyes.
document_data.Activities: Karadandel frequented darren (gambling clubs), where she sold her services to the best bidder. She was one of the few citizens in Tarmalune who knew the truth about the [[Achazar|Raging Flame]] amid the city.
